Menu Bar 3 hrs
Task 1: Create a simple html page with menu bar #
  <!DOCTYPE html>
  <html>
    <head>
        <title> Page Title </title>

    </head>
    <body>
      <header>
          <nav>
              <!-- Menu bar -->
              <ul>
                <li><a href="products.html"> Products</a></li>
                <li><a href="login.html"> Login</a></li>
              </ul>
          </nav>
      </header>
      <main>
        <h1>Page Content</h1>
      </main>

    </body>
  </html>
